subsc: General agriculture, fishing and forestry sector

abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Sector Credit Project
            Loan for Colombia was signed on August 13, 1993. The project
            was declared effective on November 10, 1993. The original
            closing date was June 30, 1999. Upon the Borrower's
            request, the loan, having had no disbursements was
            effectively canceled on January 1, 1995. The primary reason
            for the Loan's cancellation was the government's
            lack of compliance with the dated covenants and conditions,
            contained in the Loan Agreement (LA), regarding the
            scheduled liberalization of the agricultural lending rates.
